member.name: T:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1
member.summary: Defines methods to perform generic CRUD operations on the records stored in the database.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.FindAll
member.summary: Returns all records of the class type/all records from a table in the database.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.FindById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the class record/row from the relative database table that corresponds with the given unique identifier.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.Create(`0)
member.summary: Returns true if the given entity was successfully created in the database. The method returns false otherwise.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.isExists(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether or not the database contains a record corresponding with the Id input.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.Update(`0)
member.summary: Returns true if the given entity was successfully updated in the database. The method returns false otherwise.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.Delete(`0)
member.summary: Returns true if the given entity was successfully deleted from the database. The method returns false otherwise.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Contracts.IRepositoryBase`1.Save
member.summary: This method applies entity framework changes to the database records. If any changes have been made then it returns true. If no changes were made then it returns false.

member.name: T:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController
member.summary: Endpoint used to interact with the Authors in the book store's database.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController.GetAuthors
member.summary: Get all authors.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController.GetAuthor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get an author by their Id.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController.Create(BookStore_API.DTOs.AuthorCreateDTO)
member.summary: Creates an author.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController.Update(System.Int32,BookStore_API.DTOs.AuthorUpdateDTO)
member.summary: Updates and author's record.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.AuthorsController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes an author by Id.

member.name: T:BookStore_API.Controllers.BooksController
member.summary: Interacts with the books table.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.BooksController.GetBooks
member.summary: Get all books.

member.summary: Gets a book by Id.

member.name: M:BookStore_API.Controllers.BooksController.Create(BookStore_API.DTOs.BookCreateDTO)
